title: ‘He’s sweating now’: Activists hang ex-prince Andrew arrest photo inside France's Louvre Museum
summary_full: A British activist group, 'Everyone Hates Elon,' staged a daring stunt at the Louvre, hanging a framed photo of ex-Prince Andrew. The image, taken after his arrest on misconduct charges, was captioned 'He's Sweating Now,' referencing his controversial 2019 interview. The group's bold move aims to draw attention to the ongoing scrutiny surrounding Andrew's association with Jeffrey Epstein.
